content.raw:
When using this branch, we skip the intermediate landing page. However, instead of:

# 

http://localhost/cloudsim/inside/cgi-bin/console

```




the address bar now displays:


```
# 

http://localhost/cloudsim/inside/cgi-bin/usercheck.py?openid_identifier=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Faccounts%2Fo8%2Fid&openid.ns.ext1=http%3A%2F%2Fopenid.net%2Fsrv%2Fax%2F1.0&openid.ext1.mode=fetch_request&openid.ext1.type.email=http%3A%2F%2Faxschema.org%2Fcontact%2Femail&openid.ext1.required=email
```

The intermediate landing page is clicked only once and never shown again, while we have to look at the address bar the entire time
content.html:
When using this branch, we skip the intermediate landing page. However, instead of:

http://localhost/cloudsim/inside/cgi-bin/console

the address bar now displays:

http://localhost/cloudsim/inside/cgi-bin/usercheck.py?openid_identifier=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Faccounts%2Fo8%2Fid&openid.ns.ext1=http%3A%2F%2Fopenid.net%2Fsrv%2Fax%2F1.0&openid.ext1.mode=fetch_request&openid.ext1.type.email=http%3A%2F%2Faxschema.org%2Fcontact%2Femail&openid.ext1.required=email ```

The intermediate landing page is clicked only once and never shown again, while we have to look at the address bar the entire time
